text: Pacific Blue is an American crime drama series. It is about a team of police officers with the Santa Monica Police Department who patrolled its beaches on bicycles. The show ran for five seasons on the USA Network, from March 2, 1996, to April 9, 2000. It had 101 episodes. The series is often described as "Baywatch on bikes". It series was run in many other markets, including Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Denmark, Egypt, France, Kosovo, Germany, Hungary, Israel, Italy, Lebanon, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Ukraine, Russia, Spain, South America, Sweden, and Zimbabwe. ==Other websites== * Category:1996 American television series debuts Category:2000 American television series endings Category:1990s American drama television series Category:2000s American drama television series Category:1990s crime television series Category:2000s crime television series Category:American crime television series Category:USA network shows Category:Television series set in Chicago Category:English-language television programs
title: Pacific Blue
